name: I Am Not Edible!
description:
• WASD, Arrows - Movement
  • M, Esc, Enter - Pause
  • Left Mouse Button, E - Attack or Interact
  • Mouse Move - Rotate
History:

Once upon a time there was a grandfather and a grandmother and they decided one day to bake a Bun.

"Well, the poor have a Grandfather and a Woman! I'm leaving," thought Kolobok and jumped out of the window right out of the oven.

"I'm not just a piece of dough for you. I am a creature of hunger and flame. I managed to escape from the criminal hands of my Grandparents. I've seen real hell, you've never dreamed of it. Too often death has been with me. But you know what? I can't be eaten that easily. I'm not Edible.
